column4: Your silent incursion did not attract the attention of the creatures in the mountain.
column5:
Use at the beginning of an adventure before any Hero has taken a turn.
Draw the top Dungeon Tile and place it next to any unexplored edge. You do not place Monsters or draw Encounter Cards as a result of placing this tile.
This boon can only be used once per adventure.

column4: The defeat of the Duergar garrison grants you time to pass unnoticed.
column5:
Use when a Devil Monster Card is drawn.
Discard the Monster Card.
This boon can only be used once per adventure.

column4: You have befriended a group of traveling dwarven traders.
column5:
Use between adventures that are part of the "Assault on Firestorm Peak" super adventure.
Heroes can purchase equipment from a party of friendly dwarven traders.
Draw 5 Treasure Cards to create their store.

column4: Your bold strike against the kobold tribe has left them scattered.
column5:
Use when a Reptile Monster Card is drawn.
Discard the Monster Card.
This boon can be used only once per adventure.

column4: The power vacuum left by the dead chieftain leaves the orcs too busy fighting among each other to deal with you.
column5:
Use when an Orc Monster Card is drawn.
Discard the Monster Card.
This boon can only be used once per adventure.

column4: Your thorough exploration of the dungeon provides you with a head start.
column5:
Use at the beginning of an adventure before any Hero has taken a turn.
Draw the top Dungeon Tile and place it next to any unexplored edge. You do not place Monsters or draw Encounter Cards as a result of placing this tile.
This boon can only be used once per adventure.
